De los mejores juegos que he conocido, jugabilidad sencilla y entretenido si se quiere pasar buenos ratos volando extremidades y escuchando explosiones, y aun cuando ya te conoces todas las campañas crees que puede volverse repetitivo, cada partida es diferente y siempre hay algo por hacer si eres un cazador de logros y tambien siempre es divertido volver a pasar los mapas con amigos o un versus en el online siendo zombie con habilidades.
el mejor juego de que he probado de zombies shooter y compañerismo. muy buenos graficos para la edad del juego

disconnect often whats wrong

Good & the original game, sad its fame only lasted a year and it got ported to L4D2. 

This game may seem small but its very great for a 2008 game. Although around 20K people play L4D2, this game still gets visited by veterans, though only having about 1000 people online, but pretty great for a near-decade game.

It also has that "no-hope" and "darker" atmosphere L4D2 doesn't have. 

So, its a decent game to me, but L4D2 has more replayability in my opinion.
Muito bom o jogo, fica ainda melhor co-op !!!

There is no reason not to buy this game. A good break for hardcore gamers as it's one of the most casual fps games you can play. Shoot, heal and carry on until final level with hordes of zombies. 10/10 would play forever.
One of the best games i have ever played. This brings back so many great and funny memories and i strongly suggest you check this game out. Lots of fun!
Jogo muito bom, principalmente se você gosta de bastante ação, É pura diversão sem se tornar repetitivo.

#TB yapabileceğiniz zombilerle dolu olan efsane bir oyun çok eski sayılmaz arkadaşlarınız ile güzel vakit geçirmenizi sağlıyor.
Left 4 Dead 是我心目中的经典作品，以往破解版只能和电脑组队，现在能和在线玩家一起携手通关真是激情倍加，游戏节奏偏快，需要玩家与玩家之间保持阵型，相互辅助，所以一般无脑流玩家会死得很惨。另外或许是旧年代的产物，关卡和枪械都偏少，通关到后面的关卡，没什么大规模的杀伤力武器，与接踵而来的尸潮相比，求生四人组显得势单力薄，希望Left 4 Dead 2能增多武器的种类和关卡的数目。
Класс
Jeu complet et très divertisant si tu as envie de tuer des zombies.

Игруха прикольная, особенно классно играть вместе с друзьями). из плюсов: интересно играть в режиме сражения или просто проходить компании вместе с друзьями. Не слишком требовательная игра я на старом ноуте играю комфортно. Из минусов быстро надоедает но эту проблему можно решить с помощью скачивания других карт и компаний))

I tried to find something in this game to like, but it's just boring. I was stupid enough to waste my time with this game and exceed the 2 hour limit (I'm guessing I'm only 10 mins over the 2 hour limit) hoping steam would accept my refund. Looks like I was sadly mistaken. Either way, don't be retarded, like me, and buy this game. It's pretty bad. I recommend Left 4 Dead 2 or even better yet Killing Floor. This game is just boring. Not only that but the community is actually terrible. I mean, I had a hard time believing the bad reviews, but no, they're right. Litterally the moment I got into Versus Game lobby I was kicked immediately. I was shocked at how unbelievably right these people we're. But hey I had a good wank afterward so I guess it wasn't all that bad.

1/10 

As for the wank

11/10 Felt like I ran a boston marathon after I was done.
Um puta jogão haha

Bom, gostei do game pois, me fez criar amizades, me faz viciar que nem maluco, e quando vem ordas, eu fico em choque, e a sensação pior e quando vc está prestes a entrar no veículo de fuga e os players não vem logo......

Jogabilidade: não e dificil, é simples e levemente não muito precisa.

História: possui uma boa quantidade de campanhas, que te faz sentir um sentimento de loucura.

Configurações: super levinho, roda até num microondas.

Servidor: uma grande bosta, meu ping ta verde, e continuo lagado, e tem um detalhe, percebi que, o host sempre ta melhor de conexão, e o ultimo a entrar na sala, está com o ping nas alturas, uma especie de efeito dominó, resumindo, servidor e uma boa bosta.

Opinião: tirando o servidor de merda, esse jogo e seu sucessor e uma DELÍCIA!
Es como Half-Life 1, el inicio del todo...

Gra Left 4 Dead to pierwsza część gry Left 4 Dead. W grze sterujemy 1 z 4 postaci i do przechodzenia mamy 6 różnych kampanii. W grze otrzymujemy także tryb "Kontra" w którym sterujemy zarażonymi i tryb "przetrwanie" w którym musimy jak najdłużej przetrwać na mapie i przetrwać hordy zombie. Sama gra ogólnie jest bardzo dobra, grafika jak na 2008 rok jest niezła, dźwiękowo także.
